resources.string: Name is required "\n" (Letters Only, Min:5, Max:10 )
Instruction:"\n"You have (%s) to answer all question. Each question carry equal mark. When you are out of time your work will be submitted Automatically.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Which country has the rand as its currency|South Africa|Rwanda|Kenya|Nigeria
Afrikaans is a variety of which European language?|Catalan|Albania|Dutch|Cyprus
From which European country did Angola achieve independence in 1975?|France|Portugal|Brazil|Argentina
Which country includes the Yoruba, Ibo, and Hausa-Fulani peoples?|Nigeria|Benin|Congo|Ghana
What is the capital of Kenya?|Freetown|Accra|Nairobi|Abuja
What does ANC stand for?|African National Congress|Africans National Community|African New Congress|African Neglected Countries
Which is the second longest river in Africa?|Nile|Limpopo|Benue|Zaire, formerly Congo
What is Africa largest country|Sudan|South Africa|Kenya|Madagascar
Ikokore is a famous food among Ijebu people in|Congo|Nigeria|Rwanda|Sudan
Which of the following country is the Giant of Africa?|Egypt|Cameroon|Morocco|Nigeria

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: South Africa
Dutch
Portugal
Nigeria
Nairobi
African National Congress
Zaire, formerly Congo
Sudan
Nigeria
Nigeria
